name: CJ Dreams
description:
One day, CJ decided to prove to everyone that he was the most dangerous gangster in the neighborhood, but went a little overboard. Will you be able to save the poor guy from the clutches of the Feds and not die in the rocks of the Mojave Desert?

CJ Dreams - An interactive side-scrolling shooter in which you have to fly on a jetpack on the rocks, trying not to crash. Avoid spatial anomalies and rock crashes to avoid damaging your jetpack and periodically cool it down on special rocks.

Game Features:
- Unusual visual style
- Dynamic and unhurried gameplay
- Unique atmosphere
